<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4060) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 222</row>

**Archetype** [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18)

**Prerequisites**
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900)

</column>

---

You gain resistance equal to half your level to all damage from effects with the appropriate trait for your School of Perfection: [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) for Unblinking Flame, [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) for Unbreaking Waves, [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5) for Unfolding Wind, and [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) for Untwisting Iron. After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.
name: Perfect Resistance
